aboutPage.description: Rubic is a multichain DeFi ecosystem which features cross-chain, P2P, instant swaps and limit orders across multiple blockchains, aiming to deliver a complete ONE-STOP decentralized platform.

0.title: Custom routing
0.description: Rubic created a routing solution that will allow users to trade any token. The main advantage is the ability to calculate gas prices and show users the best-optimized solution with paying the least amount of gas.

1.title: Instant Trade
1.description: Execute an instant trade using external DEXs (while getting best rates)

2.title: Multichain support
2.description: Currently supported blockchains: Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain & Polygon)

3.title: Cross-chain swaps
3.description: Complete swaps between these networks: BSC <-> Ethereum & Polygon <-> Ethereum

4.title: Faucet
4.description: Our Faucet feature will allow users to buy tokens using RBC or ETH without KYC. Currently, users are able to buy BNB, but more to come!

5.title: P2P Trades
5.description: Create your trade and choose your own terms

6.title: Limit Order
6.description: Set the desired rate and your deal will be executed automatically when one of the DEXs meets the parameters of your deal

data.3: Multichain Support: Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain & Polygon networks
data.5: Percentage of platform revenue can be regulated

data: Cross-chain Solutions For ETH And BSC
Creating BRBC And Building Rubic Bridge For RBC-BRBC
CoinGecko And Coin Market Cap API For ETH<>RBC
New Wallets support - Wallet Connect + WalletLink (Coinbase)
New Blockchain/Bridge Integrations (Candidates: Anyswap/XDai, HECO, Moonbeam, Fantom, Avalanche, RenBTC)
Rubic Cross-Chain 2.0 development begins, improving stability and decentralization
Creating a 24/7 technical support team for our community
Beginning of a new blockchain integration
Rubic Relay Widget partners and integrations

Three new blockchains integrated (Compatible with Rubic Cross-Chain) Candidates: Avalanche (AVAX), Cardano (ADA), Cosmos (ATOM), Polkadot (DOT), Kusama (KSM), Fantom (FTM), Elrond (EGLD), Enjin (ENJ), Pulse chain (ticker PLS), Optimism, Arbitrum
Yield Farming and/or Lending Product integrations
3-6 new blockchain integrations (Compatible with Rubic Cross-Chain)

0.title: How To Contact Support?
0.answer: If you need assistance, feel free to contact our support team here by submitting a ticket on our website or on our Telegram: https://t.me/RubicSupportBot Live chat - Contact Rubic team for immediate assistance using chat. Available 24/7. Email Support - support@rubic.finance. Message Rubic Support anytime with more complex or technical questions. We're here to help.

1.title: How can I solve the “Execution Reverted: Pancake: K” error?
1.answer:
Reason:
 This usually happens when you are trying to swap a token with its taxes included. 

 How to solve:
 To fix the “Pancake: K” error, you need to change slippage. Also, you can try to change the number of tokens that you are trying to swap. 
Let’s say that you’re trying to swap 10000 Token A for BNB. To fix this, you need to change the last number of Token A. For example, instead of inputting “10000”, change it to “10001”.
 You can also try to decrease the number of tokens you are trying to swap.

2.title: What can I do with the “Error: Transaction Gas Too Low”?
2.answer: Reason: Temporal malfunction of the RPC used in the wallet for the chosen network. If this error occurs, the transaction has not been sent and the money will not be debited from your wallet. How to solve: Due to the temporal malfunction of the RPC used in the wallet for the chosen network, it can rectify itself over time. You can also try to resend the transaction or just wait a while. If if you have tried 2 to 3 times and nothing helps, there is another solution to try: change the RPC to the relevant one, you can find out how to do it and which RPC is relevant at the current moment in time in the support chat on the website, or in our Telegram: https://t.me/RubicSupportBot.

3.title: Why do I get the Error: “INSUFFICIENT_OUTPUT_AMOUNT”?
3.answer:
Reason:
 You're trying to swap tokens, but your slippage % tolerance or liquidity is too low.

 How to solve:
 1. Try trading a smaller amount at one time.
 2. Increase your slippage % tolerance.
 3. Lastly, try inputting an amount with fewer decimal places or remove the decimals, if at all possible.

4.title: Why do I get “Warning! Error Encountered During Contract Execution [Out of Gas]”?
4.answer:
Reason:
 There was not enough gas for the transaction.

 This scanner error means the gas limit you set was above the minimum but still not sufficient to get the transaction to execute. Please try again with a higher gas limit. Also, we recommend not to change the gas limit manually, your wallet will set the needed amount automatically.

5.title: How to solve the “TransferHelper: TRANSFER_FROM_FAILED” (On PancakeSwap) error?
5.answer:
1. Check to make sure you have sufficient funds available.
 2. Ensure you have given the contract allowance to spend the amount of funds you're attempting to trade with.
3. Change the last digit in the entered amount to "1".

6.title: Why do I get the “Insufficient Balance” error?
6.answer:
If you swap a native token and you encounter this error it means that you are trying to send all of your transferable funds out, without leaving enough balance for the transaction fees. If you transfer a non-native token, a value exceeding the available balance has been entered in the “Amount” field. 
Also, please check that you have connected the proper wallet and you have enough tokens for the swap.
The fee is shown on the transfer screen before you confirm the transfer. Deduct this amount from the total amount you're sending out, and your transfer will go through.

7.title: What can I do if I get the “TRANSFER_FAILED” error?
7.answer:
Make sure you have 30% more tokens in your wallet than you intend to trade, or try to trade a lower amount. If you want to sell the maximum possible, try 70% or 69% instead of 100%.
Another possible cause of this issue is the malicious token issuer just suspended the trading of their token. That, or they made the action of selling only possible for selected wallet addresses. Please always do your own research to avoid any potential fraud. If the token you are trying to swap fails with this error code, it is likely coming from an airdrop that is most likely a scam. Please do not perform any token approvals or follow any links, otherwise your funds may be at risk if you try to do so.

8.title: What should I do if I get the “Price Impact Too High” error?
8.answer:
Reason:
 This error is caused by low liquidity.

Try trading a smaller amount, or increase slippage tolerance via the settings icon and try again. If that did not help, then the token’s liquidity is too low to swap.

9.title: What can I do if I get “Execution Reverted: TransferHelper: TRANSFER_FROM_FAILED”?
9.answer: Reason: This error happens when trading tokens with insufficient allowance (in case you have changed the approved amount manually upon signing in the wallet), or when a wallet has insufficient funds. How to solve: Check to make sure you have sufficient funds available. Ensure you have given the contract allowance to spend the amount of funds you're attempting to trade with. If the above methods do not help, please contact our support team via chat on the website or our Telegram: https://t.me/RubicSupportBot.

10.title: Why do I get “Transfer Amount Exceeds Allowance”?
10.answer: Reason: This happens when you set a limit on your spending allowance when you first approve the contract, then you try to swap more than that limit. Please contact our support team via chat on the website or our Telegram: https://t.me/RubicSupportBot We will advise you on the steps to take to resolve the problem.

11.title: Why do I get the “BEP20/ERC20: Transfer Amount Exceeds Balance” error?
11.answer:
Reason:
 Your balance is insufficient.

 There is a possibility that the operation of receiving this token succeeded but the data about it was not updated on the website.
Please, clear the cookies on the website and reload the page. Also, check that you have enough tokens to process the transaction.

12.title: Why do I get “Internal JSON-RPC Error. { "code": -32000, "message": "insufficient funds for transfer" } - Please Try Again.”?
12.answer:
Reason:
 You don't have enough native tokens to pay for the transaction fees. Please, check that you have enough tokens to pay fees.

13.title: What can I do if I get `Swap Failed: Error: [ethjs-query] While Formatting Outputs From RPC '{"value":{"code":-32603,"data":{"code":-32603,"message":"handle request error"}}}'?

14.title: Method Execution Error: Error: Internal JSON-RPC error. { "code": -32000, "message": "header not found"}

15.title: Why does my Instant Trade swap have a long-lasting “Pending” status?
15.answer: Reason: It’s possible that the gas fee that was set is not enough to process your transaction. How to solve: If the transaction is “Pending”, it is best to accelerate the transaction manually, by changing to the desired value of gas, in order to force the completion of the transaction. It can be done via your wallet. You will be able to pay an additional gas fee. If you still need assistance, feel free to contact our support team hereby submitting a ticket or on Telegram https://t.me/RubicSupportBot

16.title: What if my transaction has a “Dropped & Replaced” status?
16.answer:
Dropped & Replaced" means the transaction has been replaced by a new one.

 There are two possible reasons for that status:
1. You have accelerated the transaction in your wallet and will receive the desired tokens, you can find out information about the transaction in the “Replaced by Txn Hash" tab.
2. You probably cancelled the transaction by mistake. The assets will not be debited from your address, but the gas fee will not be refunded back to you.

17.title: What if I have an “Insufficient funds” error?
17.answer:
Reason:
There is not enough native token for the gas fee + transaction.

How to solve:
If you swap a native token and you encounter this error, it means that you are trying to send all of your transferable funds out, without leaving enough balance for the transaction fees. If you transfer a non-native token, a value exceeding the available balance has been entered in the “Amount” field. 
Also, please check that you’ve connected the proper wallet and you have enough tokens for the swap.
The fee is shown on the transfer screen before you confirm the transfer. Deduct this amount from the total amount you're sending out, and your transfer will execute properly.

18.title: Why did I get the ”Expired” status
18.answer:
The transaction was not mined in the time period allotted for it.

In this scenario, the transaction should be sent again. Note that during the transaction, the gas spent on its execution is burned, but not completely. A gas fee is also charged for conducting the re-sent transaction.

19.title: Why do I have a long-lasting “Pending” status of a Multi-Chain transaction?
19.answer: Presumably, gas prices increased dramatically during that time. If the above methods did not help, please contact our support team via chat on the website or Telegram: https://t.me/RubicSupportBot.

20.title: What if the MAX button doesn’t take all my tokens in a Multi-Chain swap?
20.answer: For some of the swaps, the MAX button does not substitute the entire amount of tokens that you hold. This happens because it includes the slippage in it. When you tap MAX, it enters into the amount field a bit less, but can send all sum or less, depending on the slippage on both networks.

21.title: Why was my Multi-chain transaction canceled?
21.answer: Sometimes transactions become cancelled. It depends on a few causes: slippage and token rate. Multi-Chain swap cannot be completed as fast as Instant Trades, since it needs to be realised as an Instant Swap on both networks. The reason for the cancellation may be a change in the price of the token and you would have received below the expected “Minimum Received” amount of tokens. For a refund, please contact our support team via chat on the website or Telegram: https://t.me/RubicSupportBot

22.title: What is the Rubic Relay widget and how can we integrate it?
22.answer: The Rubic Relay is a great solution for the problems projects face regarding low user turnover. It keeps users on your website, transforming trades into a simple action: the Relay offers users and project owners the function of buying and selling tokens on their own project’s webpage, leading users to stay on your website for longer out of sheer utility. The Relay is also scalable across different devices, and it’s possible to change the colours and size of the Relay widget itself as well. Here is a detailed instructional guide for the Relay’s integration: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ULxjzN3sVc2indb5-_PtR7v7jui_tCJ7/view?usp=sharing

Starting from Oct, 19 to Nov,2  our users will be able to complete swap using their favorite tokens on the Avalanche network using Rubic Multi-Chain Routing and get GAS refunded.
